attributes.action: Get trading standards to take notice about garra rufa fake advertising
attributes.additional_details:
Get trading standards to take notice about garra rufa fake advertising, How many times will it take to get them to do something about the advertising of garra rufa.
People state they have garra rufa and infact dont have them as they another species of garra and totally different, if i advertised a sony telly as toshiba i would be taken down by trading standards and fined.

So please sign this to get something done about this...
